scripts.dev: concurrently "dotnet watch --project apps/api/TalentSkillHarvester.Api.csproj --launch-profile http" "npm run dev --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/web"
scripts.build: dotnet build apps/api/TalentSkillHarvester.Api.csproj && npm run build --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/web && npm run build --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/shared
scripts.test: dotnet test apps/api/TalentSkillHarvester.Api.csproj && npm run test --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/web && npm run test --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/shared
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/web && npm run typecheck --workspace @talent-skill-harvester/shared
